title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Collective Autobiographical Approaches for Digital Learning Design Collaboration Networking

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete one language education project by collaborating with peer practitioners using digital learning design tools.
Learners can analyze colleagues’ practical experiences through a collective autobiographical approach and derive at least three improvements for their own instructional design.
Learners can establish and present a sustainability plan for a digital learning design collaboration network based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
